statements: SELECT * FROM SocialMediaSentiments;
SELECT post_content, sentiment_score FROM SocialMediaSentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT author_id, post_date FROM SocialMediaSentiments ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_content FROM SocialMediaSentiments WHERE author_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score, post_date FROM SocialMediaSentiments WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaSentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT post_id, post_content, author_id FROM SocialMediaSentiments WHERE author_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM SocialMediaSentiments
SELECT post_content FROM SocialMediaSentiments WHERE post_content LIKE '%great%'
SELECT author_id, MIN(sentiment_score), MAX(sentiment_score) FROM SocialMediaSentiments GROUP BY author_id ORDER BY MAX(sentiment_score) DESC
SELECT * FROM sentiments;
SELECT tweet_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT tweet_text, created_at FROM tweets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(tweet_id) FROM tweets GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT sentiment_category, AVG(sentiment_score) FROM sentiments GROUP BY sentiment_category;
SELECT * FROM sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT tweet_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiments WHERE sentiment_category = 'positive' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT tweet_text, created_at FROM tweets WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT tweet_text FROM tweets WHERE tweet_id IN (5678, 6789, 7890);
SELECT tweet_text, sentiment_category FROM tweets t JOIN sentiments s ON t.tweet_id = s.tweet_id ORDER BY t.created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 100;
SELECT post_content, post_likes, post_comments FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_likes > 50 ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, positive_sentiments, negative_sentiments FROM product_sentiments WHERE positive_sentiments > negative_sentiments;
SELECT user_id, username, followers_count + following_count AS total_followers FROM social_media_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM social_media_users ORDER BY followers_count DESC
SELECT username, followers_count, following_count FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 100 ORDER BY followers_count DESC
SELECT post_content, post_likes, post_comments FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_likes DESC
SELECT product_name, positive_sentiments, negative_sentiments FROM product_sentiments WHERE positive_sentiments > 50 ORDER BY positive_sentiments DESC
SELECT user_id, username, followers_count, following_count FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count + following_count > 200 ORDER BY followers_count, following_count DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, reaction_type FROM reactions WHERE reaction_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT comment_text FROM comments WHERE user_id = '3b2c1f67-3480-4f9d-bb00-61b38bb415d8';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, post_text, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, reaction_type FROM reactions WHERE reaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY reaction_date DESC;
SELECT post_text, username FROM posts JOIN users ON posts.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM brand_users;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM brand_users WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT post_content FROM brand_posts WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT sentiment_score, created_at FROM public_opinions WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, release_date FROM brand_products WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM brand_users ORDER BY followers_count DESC, username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_posts FROM brand_posts WHERE post_content LIKE '%important%' AND created_at > '2022-01-01';

SELECT b.product_name, p.price, COUNT(*) as total_posts FROM brand_products b INNER JOIN brand_posts p ON b.product_id = p.post_id GROUP BY b.product_name, p.price HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY p.price DESC;

SELECT bp.post_id, bh.hashtag, COUNT(*) as total_posts FROM brand_posts bp INNER JOIN brand_hashtags bh ON bp.post_id = bh.post_id GROUP BY bp.post_id, bh.hashtag HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_opinions WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
